data.title: The Life of Sir Richard F. Burton by Isabel Burton 1893
data.meta_description: The Complete Works of Captain Sir Richard Francis Burton, including his journal articles, together with the standard biographies, numerous portraits, images and critical commentary. Supplemented by the Complete Works of Isabel Burton, and John Hanning Speke.  Free and unexpurgated.
data.text:
Match:

The Life of

Captain

Sir Richard F. Burton

K. C. M. G., F. R. G. S.

by his wife

Isabel Burton

First edition of 1893 in two volumes.

London: Chapman and Hall.

Volume 1: PDF Page Images.

Volume 2: PDF Page Images.

(courtesy of Microsoft, via the Internet Archive).

Isabel's curious cover designs, in which her Earthly Master R.F.B. reaches down from Heaven, and a faithful companion pines at the grave of its master.
